title: Use the Log to Identify Problems

questions.question: Which of the following is not a logical step to take when debugging an FME workspace?
options: Interpret the log for warnings and errors
Inspect the data at key stages of the translation
Create a duplicate workspace from scratch
Check reader, writer, or transformer parameters at the point of failure

questions.question: Seeing an INFORM message in your log means your workspace halted mid-translation.
FME writes a spatial log file containing any features mentioned in the log to the folder containing the workspace.
Seeing an ERROR message in your log usually means your workspace halted mid-translation.
